original_text: Then the Ammonites went across the Jordan River to fight against the tribes of Judah, Benjamin and Ephraim. The Israelites were in a lot of trouble.
korean_text: 암몬 자손이 또 요단을 건너서 유다와 베냐민과 에브라임 족속과 싸우므로 이스라엘의 곤고가 심하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Ammonites went across the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 암몬 사람들이 요단 강을 건넜고

sentences.original_text: to fight against the tribes of Judah, Benjamin and Ephraim
sentences.korean_translation: 유다, 베냐민, 에브라임 지파와 싸우려 했습니다

sentences.original_text: The Israelites were in a lot of trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 큰 곤경에 처하게 되었습니다
